definitions.definition: A type of turret on the roof of certain medieval buildings designed to allow ventilation or the admission of light .
A series of sloping overlapping slats or boards which admit air and light but exclude rain etc.
Any of a system of slits, as in the hood of an automobile, for ventilation.

main_definition: A type of turret on the roof of certain medieval buildings designed to allow ventilation or the admission of light . [from 14th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly in the plural ) A series of sloping overlapping slats or boards which admit air and light but exclude rain etc. [from 16th c.]
Any of a system of slits, as in the hood of an automobile, for ventilation.
